title: Main Street Manayunk
description:
Main Street is right outside your window!
This spacious, 725 square foot, well-maintained, one bedroom second floor apartment offers three oversize rooms, consisting of a large living room, an adjoining master bedroom and kitchen. Tile bath with tub and shower.
Entire apartment has recently been completely remodeled. That includes all new kitchen cabinets, stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher, full size gas range, microwave, garbage disposal and refrigerator, plus a full size dresser/closet. Designer ceiling fans and LED light fixtures. Newly refinished hardwood floors. Oversize energy efficient windows and nine foot high ceilings make this a very pleasant and airy living space. Economical gas hot water with individually controlled thermostat baseboard heat; two Energy Star window A/Cs keep utility bills low. Cable ready.
The 12’ x 10’ private deck is an added highlight. The deck extends the living space and is just right for outdoor meals, barbeques and enjoying the sun.
Prime location above established business on Main Street is convenient to local eateries, shopping, bike paths, Kelly Drive, and public transportation. It’s a short bike, bus or R6 train line to center city. Equally convenient to the surrounding suburbs and Main Line.
Our tenants encourage us to mention that we are very responsive landlords!
Sorry, no pets.
Email Vince to arrange an appointment for viewing.  You won’t be disappointed.
Rent: $1450/month plus utilities.

title: Industrial touches throughout include
description:
Recently built, this 2 bedroom / 2 bath first-floor apartment is in a converted factory building, right off Main Street in Collegeville, PA. Walking distance to Ursinus College, bars and restaurants, convenience store, post office, brewery, and the Collegeville Diner. Minutes from Providence Town Center with Wegman's, Movie Tavern, and dozens of other retailers. The apartment has an open floor plan, large bedrooms, tons of natural light and cross breezes, high end finishes, hardwood floors throughout, and a semi-private entrance.
This is a must see - the living area and kitchen are one huge continuous space, almost 800 SF with great natural light. The kitchen has granite tops, a breakfast bar with counter seating for 4, dishwasher, disposal, ice maker, water dispenser, and gas range. Both bedrooms are generous in size and have a ceiling fan and cable ports. The master suite has its own bathroom and a huge walk-in closet.
Industrial touches throughout include exposed ductwork, stylish lighting fixtures, black windows, concrete windowsills, exposed steel column.
Owner pays for water / sewer. Tenant pays for their own gas, electric, cable / internet. No extra fees for parking or trash (two parking spaces are included). One dog allowed.

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Wood Floors, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 610 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 6th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as June 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 6th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

description:

Welcome to 6940 Sherwood Rd! Tucked right next to City Avenue in Overbrook Farms, this 4 bedroom / 3.5 bathroom home is bursting with character! Fantastic features include hardwood floors, a GORGEOUS kitchen, high ceilings, 2 fireplaces, lots of storage space, a huge yard, a screened-in sunroom, a long driveway with room for multiple cars, a shed out back and a front porch with classic white pillars – an impressive face on this gorgeous home. The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. title: Filter Square is calling! Adorable 3 bed 2 bath house available 8/1!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available August 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

title: Two bedroom, two bathroom on a high floor
description:
Two bedroom, two bathroom on a high floor of Center City One with city skyline views from all rooms. The home has new hardwood floors, an open and updated kitchen, modern primary bathroom, private balcony and Juliet balcony, upgraded lighting, and a side-by-side full-size washer and dryer. The floorplan offers excellent entertainment space, generously sized bedrooms and incredible closet/storage space. Residents of Center City One enjoy a 24 hour doorman, the convenience of ground floor retailers, and an attached parking garage (parking is an additional monthly fee, subject to availability). Located steps from the Avenue of the Arts and just a few short blocks from both Washington Square and Rittenhouse Square, Center City One is literally in the heart of Center City, providing easy access to many of Philadelphia's best restaurants and retailers, the main office corridors, and public transportation.

Larger, Master Bedroom on Lower Level. Laundry room off of Master Bedroom. Kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and a separate eat-in area. Central air. Hardwood flooring. title: Welcome to Pinewood Court! This 1 bedroom / 1bath
description:
Welcome to Pinewood Court! This 1 bedroom / 1bath condominium is nestled off of beautiful Antique Row in the Washington Sq. West neighborhood. Utilities Included in rent price + Fully-Furnished! Enter through the front security-gate and enjoy the serenity of the common landscaped garden and courtyard. Unit 4 boasts hardwood floors, recessed lighting and updated finishes throughout. This area showcases a large french-door that opens to your own "Juliet Balcony" giving you an incredible view of the garden below, excellent natural light year-round and the feeling of dining "alfresco" in the warmer months. Make your move easy - this unit comes fully-furnished with a luxury dining room table (with benches and chairs), a sectional sofa with a stylish coffee table, a mounted 55-inch LED 4K TV and entertainment console. The kitchen has granite counters and stainless steel appliances. The bedroom is spacious, has two large closets, two wide windows overlooking Pine Street below and is directly next to an updated 3pc. bathroom. The furnishing in this room includes a chic cherry wood queen-size wooden bed frame There is an additional closet in the bedroom that houses your high-efficiency washer/dryer via a new electric hot water heater. This Don't miss your chance to lease this incredible condo in the heart of one of Philly's most sought after neighborhood. Available starting May 15th.

title: Each thoughtfully designed unit includes kitchens
description:
Broadridge is an unrivaled community filled with sculptural, modern elements and endless amenities that deliver an unparalleled living experience. Each thoughtfully designed unit includes kitchens with custom-crafted cabinetry, bathrooms with novel design elements, and open floorplans for the modern connoisseur. Located in one of Philadelphia's most vibrant neighborhoods, Broadridge brings the best of an urban community together with a luxurious place to call home. Here, access to spaces designed for coworking, lounging, and fitness are complemented by unique features like a personal theater, expansive pool and deck, pet spa, and state-of-the-art demonstration kitchen. Steps outside Broadridge you'll find an energetic neighborhood that boasts diverse treasures like Umai Umai and La Calaca Feliz and local favorites like Fairmount Farmer's Market and Bad Brother. These reside in between rich cultural attractions like the Met and the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Unit Amenities include custom-crafted light-oak grain and navy cabinetry, Euro-styled stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher and microwave, nine-foot ceilings, sweeping city views in most residences, and your own washer and dryer. Building amenities include a lounge, coworking space, fitness center, screen room, pet spa, laundry room, demonstration kitchen, pool, deck and lounge, the West Roof Terrace, dog run, and East Terrace. **Parking Pricing: $175 unreserved $199 reserved ***Availability and Pricing is Subject to change ** **Photos are of model units

title: beautiful light filled apartment - lease takeover
description:
I am leaving the country for a work opportunity - my lease ends July 28th - I am hoping to find someone to takeover my lease - and you will then of course have an opportunity to renew. Since I will be leaving the US - I am happy to leave the place furnished/partially furnished.
The apartment is possibly the nicest unit in the building - all windows have views of gorgeous trees, and it is across the street from an elementary school - so you hear the kids play at recess weekday mornings - not so loud that it can't be tuned out by closing the windows - but sort of adds to a sense of lightness in the space.
There is plenty of storage - the apartment is cat friendly - and there is free laundry in the building and all utilities included except electric. (Yes - even internet!).
There is a small galley kitchen fit with dishwasher and garbage disposal - and bath and shower that runs very hot water.
I am flexible as to when the lease takeover can happen - especially if you want to acquire some or all of my furniture - which will make my move out easier. I am happy to include the furniture at no extra cost. (Including my TV).
The neighborhood is wonderful - I have lived in West Philly on and off over the years - this apartment is around the corner from the local 44 - which serves delicious food and a vast selection of local/imported beers. There are tons of restaurants nearby - including a Pho place, Mexican a few blocks a way, and lots of Ethiopian and Middle Eastern restaurants. And the sort of hub of the community - Baltimore Ave. and Clark Park are a 5 minute walk away - as is the MFL and trolley lines. There is almost always parking available outside of the building.
Please let me know if you are interested - this is an especially good building for students. And the maintenance is always prompt and accessible. Very safe and quiet unit - I never hear neighbors - which I think has to do with the walls being somewhat sound proof. Great for a student or professional - spacious enough for a couple, and affordable enough for a single resident.
Thanks!
Julia
